p.mixed-citation: The results were based on responses to questions about seven benefits, of which three were means-tested and four were not. Residuals were examined to avoid any violation of assumptions. Pearson's r = .01, not significant.
Responses to the statement were coded on a five-point Likert-type scale. Pearson's r=.20, pc.0001.
